acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The files were given by Allison Innes from the School of Medicine Student Affairs Office.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains information related to awards given to faculty and students of the School of Medicine. Many of the awards are described. Many winners, but not all, are listed. The first folder, containing award information by year, concerns current and discontinued awards. The following folders contain information on awards that have been discontinued. Information on current awards can be accessed at http://www.med-ed.virginia.edu/handbook/awards/index.cfm.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Following the first folder which contains award information by year, the files are arranged alphabetically by the award name.

scopecontent.p: The awards given are: Robert Bennett Bean Teaching Award, James Ernest Kindred Teaching Award, Robley Dunglison Teaching Award, Scholarship Award, Leadership Award, C. Richard Bowman Scholarship Award, Douglas W. Eastwood Anesthesiology Award, Amparo Villar-Palasi Pharmacology Award, James R. Cash Pathology Book Award, Medical Alumni Association Outstanding Student Award, Out-of-Town Attending Award, CIBA Award for Community Service, Upjohn Leadership Award, Merck Manual Awards, Sandoz Scholarship Award, American Medical Women's Association Janet M. Glasgow Memorial Scholarship Award, American Medical Women's Association Scholarship Achievement Citation, Medical Alumni Association Outstanding Student Award, Scholarship Award - School of Medicine, Student Fellowship Research Awards, Byrd S. Leavell Hematology Award, Mosby Book Award, Lange Book Award, and History of Medicine Essay Prize.
American Medical Women's Association Janet M. Glasgow Memorial Scholarship Award and Citation, continued as the AMWA Glasgow-Rubin Achievement Award and Citations
